metadata.title: Initialize Next.js Project with Core Dependencies

story.iWant: to initialize the Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui
story.soThat: the foundational codebase is ready for feature development
story.tasks: - Initialize Next.js 15 project - Initialize shadcn/ui component library - Configure Publishing Ink theme - Install development tools - Create project structure directories - Verify project structure

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given the project repository exists, When I run `npx create-next-app@latest` with the specified options, Then the project is created with Next.js 15, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 4, App Router, and src/ directory structure 2. And shadcn/ui is initialized with `npx shadcn@latest init` 3. And the Publishing Ink theme is configured in tailwind.config.ts (navy blue, amber accents, slate text) 4. And the project structure follows the Architecture spec (app/, components/, lib/, db/, etc.)

doc.title: Architecture - Project Initialization
doc.snippet: Defines the exact create-next-app command with all required flags: --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --import-alias "@/*". This provides Next.js 15, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 4, App Router, src/ directory, and clean import aliases.

doc.title: Architecture - Technology Stack
doc.snippet: Documents all foundation technology decisions including Next.js 15.x, TypeScript 5.x, Tailwind CSS 4.x, and shadcn/ui CLI v2.x. Provides rationale for each choice: App Router for React Server Components, TypeScript for type safety, Tailwind required for shadcn/ui, shadcn for WCAG AA accessible components with code ownership.

doc.title: Architecture - Project Structure
doc.snippet: Complete directory structure showing: src/app/ for Next.js App Router with (auth) and (dashboard) route groups, src/components/ with ui/ subdirectory for shadcn/ui, src/lib/ for utilities, db/ for database, hono/ for API routes, tests/ for testing, and configuration files.

doc.title: Architecture - Publishing Ink Theme
doc.snippet: Publishing Ink theme color palette: brand.deep '#1e3a8a' (Navy blue - primary), brand.warm '#d97706' (Amber - accents), brand.neutral '#64748b' (Slate - text), brand.success '#059669' (Emerald - positive), brand.error '#dc2626' (Red - alerts). These colors must be added to tailwind.config.ts.

doc.title: Epic 1 Tech Spec - Story 1.1 Objectives
doc.snippet: Story 1.1 scope: Create Next.js 15 project with TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 4, App Router. Initialize shadcn/ui component library with Publishing Ink theme. Establish project structure (app/, components/, lib/, db/, etc.). This is the first story in Epic 1 and provides the foundation for all subsequent stories.

doc.title: PRD - User Experience Principles
doc.snippet: Salina ERP should convey reliability and competence appropriate for financial and operational management software. Clean, structured layouts with clear visual hierarchy. Professional color palette (avoid playful or consumer-oriented design). Desktop-first optimization (primary users work at desks).

story-context.constraints: - MUST use exact create-next-app command specified in Architecture (lines 22-30): `npx create-next-app@latest salina-erp --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --import-alias "@/*"` - MUST follow Publishing Ink theme colors exactly: deep '#1e3a8a', warm '#d97706', neutral '#64748b', success '#059669', error '#dc2626' - MUST use pnpm as package manager (recommended by Architecture for monorepo compatibility) - MUST create directories matching Architecture spec: src/app/, src/components/ui/, src/lib/, db/, hono/, tests/ - MUST configure shadcn/ui with: TypeScript, tailwind.config.ts, src/ directory, @/* import alias, React Server Components enabled - NO database connection or API routes in this story (Story 1.2 and beyond) - NO authentication setup in this story (Story 1.4)

tests.standards: From Tech Spec Epic 1 (Test Strategy Summary): Sprint 0 MUST complete before Epic 1 implementation. Unit tests: Minimal for Epic 1 (project structure validation only). Integration tests: Will be added in subsequent stories (1.2+). E2E tests: Playwright setup in Sprint 0. For Story 1.1: No test files created in this story (foundation only). Verify project builds and runs successfully with `pnpm dev` and `pnpm build`.
tests.locations: tests/unit/ - Unit tests (Vitest) tests/integration/ - Integration tests (Vitest with test DB) tests/e2e/ - End-to-end tests (Playwright)
tests.ideas: - [AC-1] Unit test: Verify project structure matches Architecture spec (check for src/app/, src/components/ui/, src/lib/, db/, hono/, tests/ directories) - [AC-1] Unit test: Verify package.json contains required dependencies (Next.js 15, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 4) - [AC-2] Unit test: Verify components.json exists and contains correct shadcn/ui configuration - [AC-3] Unit test: Verify tailwind.config.ts contains Publishing Ink theme colors - [AC-4] Integration test: Verify project builds successfully (`pnpm build` exits with code 0) - [AC-4] Integration test: Verify dev server starts successfully (`pnpm dev` runs without errors)
